text: El detective y la muerte is a 1994 Spanish thriller film directed by Gonzalo Suárez. ==Cast== *Javier Bardem as Detective *Maria de Medeiros as María *Carmelo Gómez as Hombre Oscuro *Héctor Alterio as G.M. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Spanish films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films set in the 1990s
title: El detective y la muerte
